tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE telecom_security_keys (
  key_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  encryption_key TEXT,
  digital_certificate TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE communication_channels (
   channel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   channel_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   encryption_key_id INT,
   cert_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (encryption_key_id) REFERENCES encryption_keys(key_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (cert_id) REFERENCES digital_certificates(cert_id)
);

CREATE TABLE channel_security (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    channel_id INT NOT NULL,
    key_id INT NOT NULL,
    cert_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (channel_id) REFERENCES communication_channels(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (key_id) REFERENCES encryption_keys(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (cert_id) REFERENCES digital_certificates(id)
);

CREATE TABLE channel_encryption (
    channel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    encryption_key_id INT NOT NULL,
    certificate_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (channel_id) REFERENCES communication_channels(channel_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (encryption_key_id) REFERENCES encryption_keys(key_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (certificate_id) REFERENCES digital_certificates(certificate_id)
);
